What Is 2FA?
ЁЯТб 2FA (Two-Factor Authentication) adds an extra layer of protection to your online accounts. It requires two different factors to verify that itтАЩs really you logging in.

Enable 2FA Today! Take just 5 minutes to activate 2FA on your most important accounts тАФ email, banking, and social media. ItтАЩs one of the simplest and most effective ways to protect your digital life.

ЁЯТ╗ЁЯЫбHow to Set Up Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) for Mahidol UniversityтАЩs Google Workspace.
тАв LetтАЩs start by going to https://mail.mahidol.ac.th/.
тАв Next, log in with your Mahidol University email account.
тАв Click on your profile picture.   
тАв Then select тАЬManage your Google Account.тАЭ
тАв From the menu on the left, select тАЬSecurity.тАЭ
тАв Under тАЬSigning in to Google,тАЭ click тАЬ2-Step Verification.тАЭ
тАв Then click тАЬTurn on 2-Step Verification.тАЭ
тАв Once itтАЩs enabled, the 2-Step Verification tab will show the status as тАЬOn.тАЭ
тАв Next, choose your preferred verification method. In this demonstration, weтАЩll use Google Authenticator. Click тАЬAuthenticator.тАЭ
тАв Then click тАЬSet up Authenticator.тАЭ
тАв A QR Code will appear on your screen.
тАв Now, open the Google Authenticator app on your smartphone.
тАв Tap the plus icon.
тАв And scan the QR code displayed on your computer screen.
тАв YouтАЩll then receive a 6-digit verification code on your smartphone.
тАв Back on the website, click тАЬNext.тАЭ
тАв Enter the code in the тАЬEnter CodeтАЭ field.
тАв And click тАЬVerify.тАЭ
тАв Once setup is complete, youтАЩll see the message тАЬAuthenticator app has been set up.тАЭ
ЁЯСитАНЁЯТ╗ЁЯУ▒Setting up 2FA only takes a few minutes, but it provides powerful protection against unauthorized access. We encourage everyone to enable 2FA to keep your data and our university systems safe.
